messages.message:
Hi team,
Before the AIHUB_ENABLE_NAVBAR_REDESIGN feature flag clean-up, all nav links were clickable
The feature flag implementation in this component `webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/lib/src/AIHub/PageWrapper/NavBarTabLink.tsx` was such that it was falling back to `enableNavbarRedesign` regardless of `showLink` value
Now that the feature flag has been cleaned up it is depending on `showLink` value to determine whether nav links are clickable
For the chatbot app, I have raised a PR to fix this which involves some changes to this component as well - https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73035
Please take a look.
CC: @Paul H @Xindi Xu

The intended behaviour is -
1. In draft state, we want workspace link to be selected as well as clickable
2. In published state, we want hub link to be selected as well as clickable
